column2: wonderful space. Will be interested to see how they develop the menu over time. We've been a handful of times and everything has been
column5: but that is a dickish and reductionary thing to say Imaginary Strawman; high quality ingredients served interestingly in a pretty building is a solid concept not beholden to fashion. Wish this place all the best
column6: though it wouldn't kill them to try heating some of the stuff up.
